biotools.summary: Web server that locates transcription regulating binding sites by exploiting binding site evolutionary conservation and repeats in promoter regions. Mixed aligned and unaligned sequence data may be used.

bioschemas.name: Phyloscan
bioschemas.summary: Web server that locates transcription regulating binding sites by exploiting binding site evolutionary conservation and repeats in promoter regions. Mixed aligned and unaligned sequence data may be used.
